website_summaries.verdict: This set of 4 brackets comes with pre-drilled holes and everything you need to mount. Although you may want to consider getting higher quality drywall anchors.
pros: Work well as corner brackets, too
cons: The drywall anchors that come with the brackets are very low quality

customer_reviews.title: These are not a 90 degree angle
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this product. Tried to use to install some shelving, and I kept thinking there was something tong with the work I was doing. Turns out the brackets are at slightly more than a 90 degree angle, so try shelf won’t fit flat and when I get it flat it just rips it out of the wall, anchor and all!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Pump

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust it to hold much weight
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheap in price, quality, and appearance. It does the job. But I wish it did better. I don’t think it can hold much weight. The brackets have so much flex. If I put a lot more weight on it I have no doubt that the shelf would not be secure.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis P

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, Heavy Duty Brackets, 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Very strong brackets. Feels solid, heavy duty for the size. No flex at all. These are the second set I purchased from Alise. The first set I purchased had the extra diagonal brace, but decided to purchase this set without because they are pretty strong without them. The bracket does seem and look like some form of stainless steel, but not sure it's "304" stainless because a magnet does stick to it, but its not advertised as 304 stainless and I bought the item with this knowledge. Also came with a pack of screws, they look like stainless steel as well,
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not strong
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a very small shelf. They look OK however the brackets have a lot of flex in them and cannot hold more than a few pounds without bending. One of the brackets came with the countersinking done on the wrong side so we had to arrange a return which is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Rosslyn Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Using for other purposes too!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for mounting furniture to wall, cause have 2 toddlers who love to climb shelves. We couldn't screw the wall high up because of our lease agreement, so found a way :) they seem to hold fine, only bit longer screws would work better, we used some of our (longer) and some that were put together with the brackets.
customer_reviews.author: SimonaSaule

customer_reviews.title: Super Heavy Duty STAINLESS STEEL Brackets
customer_reviews.text: I had an application in mind for these brackets that involved cutting an inch or so off the shorter leg. Well, I missed the part about these being made of stainless steel, and cutting stainless is a real challenge, if not impossible for your average homeowner. But I can still use these, I'll just have to revise their implementation. I wouldn't be returning these regardless, because these are really nice L brackets. If you need a really solid bracket that won't break and won't bend and still looks good, these are the ones. Well worth the money, and certainly 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great brackets, bad drywall anchors
customer_reviews.text: The brackets are great! Very sturdy, and exactly what I needed for some closet shelves. All the screws you need are included; however, I knocked off one star because the drywall anchors are terrible. I assume they work OK if you can get them in, but they are difficult to install, so I used another brand of anchors in the spots where I couldn't drill straight into the stud.
customer_reviews.author: GileSmiles

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not very stiff
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but “heavy duty” is an overstatement. I used them to put up some light-duty shelves in the bathroom (3 brackets on each 5x1x40” shelf). The brackets flex a little when I press down on the shelves with my fingers, but since nothing heavy goes on them, I’m not worried. They don’t seem like they will break.
customer_reviews.author: aRegularGuy

customer_reviews.title: Not stainless steel. Magnet 🧲 had no reaction.
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t stainless steel, probably aluminum. I use very strong magnets to hang some of my tools. There was zero reaction when I placed one against these. I used them to hang a 8’x4”x1” shelf in my shop for aerosol cans, worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Will M.

customer_reviews.title: Great option to anchor a bookshelf!
customer_reviews.text: I used these brackets to anchor a white bookshelf to the wall in my baby's room. They worked great and were very sturdy, due to the multiple screws on each anchor. I also picked it for the white color, which blended in better with the bookshelf. I would recommend it, but make sure you measure the shelf to confirm the dimensions will work.
customer_reviews.author: Zach P.

customer_reviews.title: Only for supporting lightweight shelves/objects.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a shelf to hold a couple objects that total a couple pounds. These are very bendable. Definitely did not trust things on a shelf supported by these.
customer_reviews.author: ahowitt

customer_reviews.title: They're sturdy and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: I used these to hang up some light-weight shelves beside my bed. They're sturdy and reasonably priced. They do bend a bit, which is actually helpful if you're trying to hang the shelf level. The included drywall anchors are garbage. They fall apart when you hammer them into the wall and probably won't hold much weight. You can pick up better plastic anchors at the hardware store for $0.10-0.20 each (so I wonder why they didn't just include decent anchors with the product?).
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I used these for surround speaker brackets. Extremely difficult to drill new holes, it was easier to drill the box cover instead. Speakers do not deflect the bracket at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D

customer_reviews.title: Saved my cabinet, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My cabinet in my double wide was coming down. I almost lost tons of glassware. My friend used the 4 brackets and saved the cabinet. He was very impressed and ordered several sets once he was done with my cabinet. Now to load all my glass dishes back up. I'm going to order a spare set just in case. Would recommend if you need store shelf support.
customer_reviews.author: Paular

customer_reviews.title: Dont hesitate. Th3se are perfect, strong, and made very well.
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfect for me to mount two pueces of solid heavy oak wood onto my bathroom wall. They're sturdy and came with the hardware to attach it. Thanks for the quality product! To anyone wondering about this product, I'm not a paid reviewer or on their payroll like the trend I often see. This is a legitimate review and I know you'll enjoy these as well.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kitchen shelves.
customer_reviews.text: I used these brackets to put up some shelves in my kitchen. They were very easy to mount and look great. I don't plan on putting very heavy items on my shelves so I can't testify to the fact that they will hold heavy items. I do like the brackets though and when I remodel my bathroom I will be using them in there as well. Overall, a great product worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great brackets!!
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 6 of these to build out shelves in my under-stairs storage closet. Greatly appreciate that they come with all the screws and molly bolts. They are a tad wobbly upon install in terms of not resisting the downward weight from the shelves but work for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I installed the brackets into studs for extra support, by choice. It holds my shelves which are 2”x10” and 3ft without an issue. I added an extra screw through my board into the stud so it could hold a potted plant in a ceramic pot. No sagging. Looks great, I plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Payton Pettet

customer_reviews.title: Worked out Well!
customer_reviews.text: I think this was a great value. It saved me a trip to a big box home center. You get everything you need to install the brackets, screws & anchors which was great. Very sturdy brackets for by 6 inch wide board/shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Shopper in CA

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These brackets are of exceptional quality and are well-machined! They also included plenty of short and long screws as well as plastic drywall anchors. My use case was to provide a sturdy level solid surface for our daughters' college dorm room desk. This configuration allowed me to combine three different items from Ikea so that she can easily adjust the lateral width without requiring tools.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Screws were too long for my shelf!
customer_reviews.text: I got standard Rubbermaid shelves from Home Depot and unfortunately, none of the screws the brackets came with were short enough to not go through my shelf so I had to find some shorter ones. The shelf I got was a standard thickness, so I was hoping they would work, but they did not. However, with different screws these brackets were great!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!  Sturdy.  Useful.
customer_reviews.text: Useful for me! I had a tall, round chicken feeder that had no bottom tray and so purchased these brackets, screwed them into the side of the feeder and then screwed them into a round planter tray making it the bottom. Voila, a new feeder. Just one of many uses for these neat brackets. Are sturdy and come with screws although I used metal screws for my project.
customer_reviews.author: MarleneLouiseTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Nice Material
customer_reviews.text: The material has a nice brushed stainless steel finish and is rather strong for an un-braced bracket design. The only issue I found was inconsistent counter sinks for the screws. They really should sharpen their counter sink as it appeared to be chewing rather than cutting on some of them. Since this doesn't affect usability of the product I still gave it five stars, but it does imply lax QC during manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Parrish

customer_reviews.title: the finish was nice
customer_reviews.text: These are what they say they are and have a nice finish... come with some hardware (screws). They are not as strong as I needed though... I used them to hold up a small shelf for a monitor. I connected 2 to the underside of the shelf and put into beams. The other two I screwed into sides of top of shelf and then into wall fasteners. The shelf is only 8" deep and 32" long. Still, even using all 4 brackets and 2 into beams, its still very wobbly. Good product but dont expect it to hold much.
customer_reviews.author: Oren Thum

customer_reviews.title: Stainless doesn't rust
customer_reviews.text: I use these 3x5" stainless steel brackets to secure the top of the aluminum rail in a high-rise condo in Clearwater beach. Stainless steel brackets don't rust and do the job. The price for these stainless steel brackets on Amazon is cheaper than the regular steel brackets at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Alex V.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: False advertising in the item description! These are by no means “heavy duty”. Super flimsy and poorly made. I put them up to hold a 5” deep, 3/4” thick hardwood shelf (...not incredibly heavy). The weight of the shelf itself caused the brackets to become bouncy and sag. Adding any additional weight (i.e, putting anything on the shelf) would have bent the brackets so much that items would have slid forward and fallen off. These are one of the cheapest brackets on Amazon for a reason—they’re junk.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua G. Wombacher

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, sturdy brackets. The nails are a perfect length for furniture. I was worried they would go through the top of my bookshelf but they only went through the wood. They hold up a full wall-height bookshelf very well. It comes with all the screws and anchors you need to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra V

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Currently holding up over 180 lbs of spare drum gear on a 3/4" plyboard shelf, 12 feet long (spaced about 3 feet apart on studs). No sagging, etc. I dunno what the negative reviews are on about cause these are super sturdy. Maybe mine were made on a Monday?
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lumer

customer_reviews.title: great bracket
customer_reviews.text: looked all over for brackets for a narrow wall shelf. none of the box stores carry anything in that size. these are of great quality and finish. they came packaged so none of the brackets would be marred. mounting screws were of great quality and finish. I ordered 4 sets and I am finding other uses for them. GREAT PRODUCT, GREAT PRICE,
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Nice inconspicuous brackets @ good price.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for adding unnoticed support to a long shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D

customer_reviews.title: compact size and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This fit the bill! I needed smaller length but sturdy shelf brackets to support my little shelf. The price was perfect for my needs. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nani

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a 4.5 inch shelf, thin, light duty. Looks and feels good. The included hardware is a nice bonus, although for the light duty application I used shorter screws. The screws and brackets could support a lot heavier shelf. Can't beat the look for the price
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase— sturdy, love that they come with the nails and inserts for the wall. Purchased this to add to floating bookshelves for additional support and they did their job.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Olaya

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used them for our kitty shelves/pathways and seem more than sturdy to support shelf and cat.
customer_reviews.author: Ran-D

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Used it to mount a corner shelf. Works well. Probably a little overkill, but I could probably stand on the shelf. I bought brushed nickel and sprayed mine black. Saved a few bucks bc brished nickel was cheaper than black.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: it is what i needed
customer_reviews.text: i needed a set of brackets to put a shelf over my door to which i will attach a board. this will serve as an awning over the door. thanks for your product. i think it will serve very well for what i nees it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy brackets.
customer_reviews.text: 3 mm thick. Very rigid. Countersunk holes. Nicely finished. I used it for a center support on a 6-ft wide Venetian blind
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Lester

customer_reviews.title: DIY Floating Shelf
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets of these to make “floating” shelves in my bathroom. These were great for the money, I spray painted them white to match the wall and shelf and used the smaller screws they came with to mount the bracket to the wood. These were a great solution for DIY shelves, instead of spending $40/per shelf. Set comes with 2 size screws and anchors which made installing these super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Not a high tec product. Works great for what I needed. Looks great. White finish is flawless. Came with choice of screws and anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Great little shelf brackets. Had no issues with the two I've used so far, and the design looks nice with the black color scheme. The length is perfect for what I needed to mount on the wall as a little shelf, so I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: JReview11

customer_reviews.title: Secure freezer
customer_reviews.text: A restaurant kitchen we service purchased a freezer with magnetic door seals so strong that they would pull the freezer across the floor before the door would open. Your brackets were the perfect solution to fastening the freezer to the wall to secure its location and allow the door to open easier. Stainless and strong!
customer_reviews.author: Solidcore

customer_reviews.title: Nice brackets
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for our project. We needed a white bracket with these exact dimensions for shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was looking for. I haven't installed them yet, but what else can I say about an l bracket?
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: Floppy , flexy, flipper
customer_reviews.text: They do what they’re supposed to but even with pretty light weight shelving they’re pretty flexible. Definitely doesn’t instill a lot of confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and works amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdiness, very easy to install, and amazing value for your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amina

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: These were just perfect for my need. I had to put up a shelf and these were the perfect size and the screws provided worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: bushwacker

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these for two different lengths and types of shelves. The shorter shelves (8"x24" rubbermaid pre-made) are fine with two brackets but I should have gotten more than 4 for the longer shelf (8"x6' wood that I painted) because they do flex a bit once I started putting things on the shelf. They come with drywall anchors and screws which is nice. I did have buy shorter screws for the thinner shelves but that wasn't a big deal. Overall though you can't get much better quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leslee

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and like the color goes good on a glass shelf
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. Morel

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 of these sets (comes with 4). The finish was nice and fit well with the cedar boards I used to mount them. Nice that they came with drywall anchors. Screws can also be used for direct stud mounting. Overall very pleased with the purchase for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I love them. Great price makes them even better.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, screws are the right size for wallboard ...
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, screws are the right size for wallboard anchors. I doubt that I can load them enough to bend them with 3 inch shelves, but they were not built to hold more than about 10 cans of lubricants and cleaners in spray cans, which is my intended use.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Brady

customer_reviews.title: brackets
customer_reviews.text: Order for something built shelf did not work had nothing to do with brackets they were fine my plan didn't work. Used two for a shelf which worked fine no issues
customer_reviews.author: ken ayotte

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: The materials were great and machined well. However, the brackets were not square and it would take some effort to get them squared before mounting. Shelves do not work well if they lean forward or upward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't provide much support unless you triple them. 2 on bottom 1 on top middle. Not The setup I planned on originally.
customer_reviews.author: Ty and Nic

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to make Harry Potter floating book shelves. They are sturdy, and worked well. We used hard backed books and they support our cats’ extra weight when they use the shelf as a spring board. ;) They were a little over-priced.
customer_reviews.author: NavyWife67

customer_reviews.title: Few scratches
customer_reviews.text: I think so far it is a good product. But they brackets did have a few small scratches on them. They aren't noticable unless you get really close
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for lightweight shelves.
customer_reviews.text: These shelf brackets are clean and well-made, and strong enough for light to medium-duty shelf use. I used two of them to mount a custom floating-style shelf in my bathroom. I'll probably use the other pair for a spice shelf in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Stager

customer_reviews.title: PRICED RIGHT - GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Received the package of (4) brackets. All hardware was enclosed including molly screws. I was surprised how sturdy they were for the price. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it looks good and the price is better than the ones at the hardware store
customer_reviews.author: gustavo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what was needed. I went with bigger shelves then I thought I would need, so I could only use them as middle supports. Good quality, comes with screws, does not bend. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G Traweek

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: well packaged. included good wall anchors. good screws. I am satisfied - recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: If these didnt work I would have a concussion. Seeing as I'm still typing I think theyre alright. The shelf I build with them has been up for a few months right above my head.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This Is very poor quality and not really square compare to bracket I bought from Homedepot it is very thin and not study
customer_reviews.author: Henry Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Really great!
customer_reviews.text: I somehow managed to put these in my wall without a drill. They hold my shelf very well. My only complaint is that I couldn't order them in white to match my wall. Reguardless, it's a good and functional product.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: sturdy shelf brackets
customer_reviews.text: They are what they say they are and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Ed E.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Can’t hold 2 pounds of weight without falling forward. Needs 45 degree cross member. Chinese engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie W

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These work as expected. Used to install some simple shelves and couldn't be happier. They look great, were easy to install, and were the right price. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: A2MomTo3

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: The holes were not even or in the correct places. Not as durable as expected. I couldn't use them because of the holes being incorrect. I suggest finding another seller or hobby lobby has similar ones for cheap too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my personal opinion
customer_reviews.text: worked well for me. may not be what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W.

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised and made my self styled newspaper holder project for my rural mail box a success !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The color and sturdiness coupled with the price was a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Jaqua Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful finish
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t use them yet, but I see they will work and blend in with the surrounding shelf and acrylic cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Fred L. Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Just the size we needed
customer_reviews.text: We bought 5 ft shelves for our bathroom. We couldn't find the right size brackets in the local hardware stores. I was pleased to find them on Amazon! Our shelves are up and these worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: J. Process

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Not too large in size, not too small. Just about right. I just installed it and it looks pretty solid. I like that it comes with at least 2 sizes of screws. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: raymondshead

customer_reviews.title: Appearance of sagging. No good.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of these hooks and neither set were a 90 degree angle which makes the shelves look like there’s too much weight on them and they’re sagging. It does not look great and I am not happy with the purchase. I definitely wouldn’t recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Light weight use only
customer_reviews.text: These would be good for a nick-nack shelf. I had to put additional bracing to steady the 9" shelf I made for spice bottles.
customer_reviews.author: august

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Practical
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, small brackets. Very easy to install. I used my own, larger screws to dig into the wall studs. Handles a pretty well loaded shelf. Simple.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Morrissette

customer_reviews.title: Nice bracket to mount small shelves.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bracket. Polished and as described. Extremely hard S/S that appears will last and not easy to rust.
customer_reviews.author: Albert K

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy, simple and worked perfectly for my shelves
customer_reviews.text: I used these brackets to make shelves from some poplar wood planks. They are sturdy, simple and worked perfectly for my shelves. It was great that they come with hardware as well.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: These did the trick.
customer_reviews.text: As described. I needed stainless for an outdoor use and they were hard top find locally. These did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: David Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect for what i needed. Might’ve just been my drill but the first hole closest to the corner was slightly hard to get into because of how thick my drill is. Overall the product is great and super sturdy. I highly recommend putting anchors in before you put into your wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screw Tops break off - not relible
customer_reviews.text: The tops of the fastening screws broke off with minimal force and the brackets fell. Not secure and potentially dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: but I can see that they are sturdy and will serve the purpose of putting up some ...
customer_reviews.text: We have not used these yet, but I can see that they are sturdy and will serve the purpose of putting up some shelves. They are uniform and holes line up evenly. They will be just right.
customer_reviews.author: shbrink

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Hold
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product. It couldn’t hold the shelves, none of them were level. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Lamkin

customer_reviews.title: Great brackets
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Sturdy and strong enough to keep my "floating" shelf, full of books, level.
customer_reviews.author: TheGirl77

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel brackets, but not the screws.
customer_reviews.text: I used the product to stabilize a vertical tube in the ground, to prevent it from changing its position. Time will tell sturdiness, but I expect the product to hold up. However, the screws were NOT stainless steel. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Tonski

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I used as back up support for shelves. I love that they came with everything needed.
customer_reviews.author: ayla marie

customer_reviews.title: good item
customer_reviews.text: These brackets worked for what I was wanting and look like a very good, sturdy item with timely shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Wise

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make a brace for a telescope...very sturdy and makes the wood brace work well :)
customer_reviews.author: Tawodi Dekanogia

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: These were just as expected and advertised. Used it to hang a shelf for books and it looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: karapg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for reinforcement.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I bought them to reinforce my closet shelves. They work great. I received them promptly and would recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Pinterest worthy
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shelf brackets as you can see from the photo they really look great in the room! Keep in mind that they are Fairleigh bendable, I will not be able to put a lot of heavy objects on those shelves but it will definitely suffice for what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, heavy for holding shelves, etc. Great value package. Fast Delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Crow Family

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice
customer_reviews.text: A high quality, albeit simple design, bracket. Made of good stainless and finished very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesandcampbell

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Affordable
customer_reviews.text: This item looks great & comes with everything you need to get a job done well! I used these for shelf’s in my kitchen and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Wrong angle
customer_reviews.text: Solid bracket but it’s not at a 90 degree angle. We had to bend it to make it work. Hoping it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Need longer and stronger screws
customer_reviews.text: I like the brackets; but the screws could be longer and stronger. Brackets are meant to hold something up firmly. It will not work with short screws.
customer_reviews.author: Soudamini M. Nath

customer_reviews.title: They are great. super low profile
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a piece of wood I stained to make a shelf. They are great. super low profile. Easy to install. They came with hardware but the screws weren't long enough slash too short so we ended up using our own screws.
customer_reviews.author: american honky chic

customer_reviews.title: Double check every bracket to ensure same width!
customer_reviews.text: Overall study and will work to hold up my floating shelves for reinforcement. Not to be used for something you’d want to display as the holes vary in width from bracket to bracket. Very frustrated as I used the defective bracket to measure with for my wall anchors which has led to several unnecessary holes in my walls to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Strong!
customer_reviews.text: This is good product for the money you paid for. Comes with all the necessary screws and screw holder. It is strong and Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: neehong
